titles: A congratulation for his sacred majesty, Charles, the third monarch of Great Britain, his happy arrival at White-hall. / By a loyal member of his majesties army. Edinburgh, June 13. 1660.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
